name: New Victorian Long Fit Shirt Japan Style UK 6 8 10
description:
STUNNING NEW VINTAGE LOOK LONG FIT SHIRT 

Perfect item for this season - shirts are back with a vengance!

This gorgeous shirt is the perfect piece to dress up or down - go evening with a pair of teensy shorts & a brown belt or day wear with gladiator flats.

Material is a mix of lace, cotton and polyester. The upper body has tiny fine lines in it, giving a real vintage edge, and the bottom is lace trimmed.

The dress fits from a UK 6 up to a 10, depending on whether you're looking for a tight fit or a looser, baggy fit. 

Unstretched measurements are as follows:
Chest: 36 inches
Length: 34 inches

name: NEW NAUTICAL KAWAII SHIRT DRESS WHITE GREY 6 8 10 JAPAN
description:
NEW NAUTICAL SHIRT DRESS

Ahh so cute! Gorgeous grey & white nautical style shirt dress - the grey is a soft jersey material, the white is solid cotton 'shirt' material! Super cute mix, very strong masculine/pretty trends! Looks great with leggings & pumps, or high heels & accessorized to the hilt!

Would best fit between a Uk 6 and 10, depending on the fit you were after. It would give a loose, billowy fit on a 6, more average on an 8 and tighter on a 10 but please take note of my measurements!

Measurements are as follows:
Bust: 36 (unstretched) inches
Length: 29 inches 
Underbust: 34 inches
